title: How to Get Red Wine out of Fabric Using Baking Soda and Vinegar

steps.headline: Take the baking soda and put a fair amount of it on the stain so it covers the stain completely.
Take the white vinegar and blot it directly on the baking soda.
steps.description: Use about a spoonful per stain, depending on how big the stain. Don't overdo or skimp.

steps.headline: Check for any remnants and repeat if needed.

text: Assemble the items you need.  Take the baking soda and put a fair amount of it on the stain so it covers the stain completely.  Take the white vinegar and blot it directly on the baking soda. Use about a spoonful per stain, depending on how big the stain. Don't overdo or skimp. Vacuum or wash your fabric.  Check for any remnants and repeat if needed.  Allow to dry.
sentences: Take the baking soda and put a fair amount of it on the stain so it covers the stain completely.
Take the white vinegar and blot it directly on the baking soda.
Use about a spoonful per stain, depending on how big the stain.
Check for any remnants and repeat if needed.
